articles.description: Asteroid Kamo’oalewa, discovered in 2016, has puzzled astronomers with its unusual Earth-like orbit.
articles.content: For nearly a decade, a near-Earth asteroid named Kamooalewa has invoked speculation over how it came to orbit the Sun in total synchrony with Earth as though it shares some special relationship with … [+2602 chars]
